doc.title: Autosuggestion
doc.plot: The film investigates the border between the conscious and the subconscious, between the inside and the outside. How do we dream? How can a dream be shown appropriately on screen? While a man pursues his day-to-day business, reality, dream and memory blend together. A woman appears and disappears. She has left him; or maybe he broke up the relationship in the most definite way...
